C2 (also masterwork) a work of art such as a painting, film, or book that is made with great skill: Leonardo's "Last Supper" is widely regarded as a masterpiece. See also
chef-d'oeuvre formal
a skilful or impressive example of something: Her press conference was a masterpiece of media manipulation.
